info.name: Sankaku Channel SC
info.description:
Simple Centering theme for Sankaku Channel / Complex chan.sankakucomplex.com
? Night

☀️ Day
theme options.

⛔️ - Hides clutter and removes ads.
✔️ - Centers pages, New icons, Comfy.
Try it, you'll like it!
Feedback is always appreciated!
info.additionalInfo:
v2.71 - Added a lighter dark tint to the themes, changed original dark theme to 'Darker' (06-29-2017) v2.70 (06-16-2017)
  • - Changed name to "Sankaku Channel SC"
  • - Added Light theme
  • - Changed userstyle picture
  • - Mascot now has it's own configurable userstyle here
